instruction: [step 3] Using 7-bromo-2-cyclopropyl-3-iodoimidazo[1,2-a]pyridine (4.6 g, 13 mmol) obtained in step 2 and (E)-2-(3-fluoro-8-formyldibenzo[b,e]oxepin-11(6H)-ylidene)propanenitrile (2.3 g, 7.9 mmol) obtained in Reference Example 5, and in the same manner as in Reference Example 14A, step 3, (E)-2-{8-[(7-bromo-2-cyclopropylimidazo[1,2-a]pyridin-3-yl)(hydroxy)methyl]-3-fluorodibenzo[b,e]oxepin-11(6H)-ylidene}propanenitrile (4.1 g, 98%) was obtained.
response:
### Procedure:
[step 3] Using 7-bromo-2-cyclopropyl-3-iodoimidazo[1,2-a]pyridine (4.6 g, 13 mmol) obtained in step 2 and (E)-2-(3-fluoro-8-formyldibenzo[b,e]oxepin-11(6H)-ylidene)propanenitrile (2.3 g, 7.9 mmol) obtained in Reference Example 5, and in the same manner as in Reference Example 14A, step 3, (E)-2-{8-[(7-bromo-2-cyclopropylimidazo[1,2-a]pyridin-3-yl)(hydroxy)methyl]-3-fluorodibenzo[b,e]oxepin-11(6H)-ylidene}propanenitrile (4.1 g, 98%) was obtained.
